name: Face To Face (Shubhankar Thorat)
description:
Face to Face is a Puzzle Platformer Consisting of 4 level the flexible settings allow user to skip level and return back to them afterwards.

You Play as a Dice with 6 uniquely Colored sides, Players job is to Match the color on the dice to the color present on Floor

With each level the Maze will get bigger hence Providing more challenging gameplay
